pullrequest.title: Make sure camera's FPS is strictly applied, should the real time factor be impacted

content.raw: Hi, I'm facing camera image delays of about 30ms on ROS+Gazebo on Xenial/Kinetic. I'm wondering if this could be fixed by this MR. Is there something similar already upstream or is this improvement still pending on this MR?
content.html: Hi, I'm facing camera image delays of about 30ms on ROS+Gazebo on Xenial/Kinetic. I'm wondering if this could be fixed by this MR. Is there something similar already upstream or is this improvement still pending on this MR?
